head.supplied: [Algae from Port Philip Heads sent by J. Br. Wilson to Dr Sonder (1880)] ¶ [Lund of the ¶ Goths ¶ i.e. Sweden. ¶ Nov. 1882 ¶ ] ¶ J. G. Agardh ¶ Areschougia Laurencia ¶ Ballia Scoparia...

ab.style: font-size: 12pt; margin-left: -1in; hyphenate: false; break-before: page;

div.p: RB MSS M108a,Library, Royal Botanic GardensMelbourne.

M acknowledged receipt of this list in M to J. Agardh, 1 January 1883. See also M to J. Agardh, 15 January 1883(in this edition as 83-01-15a).
Algae ex Port Philip Heads a J. Br. Wilson (1880)
[Algae from Port Philip Heads sent by J. Br. Wilson to Dr Sonder (1880)]

cell.p:
Griffithsia sp. an Gr.Sonderianae
Griffithsia binderiana?

cell.style: border: none; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.075in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.075in;
border: none; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.075in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.075in;
cell.p:
Genus novum = Callipsygma Wilsoni J. Ag.
Published in Agardh (1873-90),part 5,p. 67 as Callipsygma wilsonis.
